import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDropzone } from 'react-dropzone'; import '../css/Navbar.css' function Navbar({ name, gateway, createdAt, uploadScheme }) { const [selectedFile, setselectedFile] = useState(null) /* const { getRootProps, getInputProps, open, acceptedFiles } = useDropzone({ // Disable click and keydown behavior noClick: true, noKeyboard: true, onDrop: useCallback((acceptedFiles) => { setselectedFile( acceptedFiles.map(File) ) } }); */ const onChangeHandler = event => { setselectedFile(event.target.files[0]) } const onClickHandler = () => { uploadScheme(selectedFile) } /* */ return (
Информационная система: {name} IP-адрес сети: {gateway} Дата создания системы: {createdAt}
Drag AND Drop files here or click to upload
{/*

Drag 'n' drop some files here

Files

    {files}
*/}
) } export default Navbar
